project-challenges: I was unsure what mobile platforms end users will mostly be using to access my website.  Once I learn that, I can easily convert my component based website to native app for many mobile platforms.
project-future-plans: Build native apps with the same code base for platforms that are the most pertinent.
project-inspiration: My idea is that the web is accessible to everyone so I built a website instead of a native mobile app.
project-lessons-learned: How to design not just for mobile users but for people with low end phones so that they have a fast experience.
project-accomplishments: First time I have ever built an offline first website
project-subtitle: Sometimes we all just need a hand up instead of a handout.
